page.title: 10Farming N.E.of Richmond.
page.content: Most of the land is between 100m.and 200m.above sea level.A large percentage of the land in this area is owned by the Marquess of Zetland and let to tenants.The tenant of Gascoigne Farm is Mr.Blair who also has Halfe Hill Farm at Skeeby. Low Wathcote White Fields Farm are managed for Lady Serena James by Mr.R.Fawcett. The farming is mixed.Arable and grassland being more or less equal except where the land is more hilly where grass predominates.The crops are mainly barley,wheat and oil seed rape with the odd field of swedes and potatoes.Sheep and beef cattle are raised on the grassland.Mr.Blair has some pigs at Halfe Hill Farm.
